description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 2/02/2007

Taylor tells Phoebe and Ridge that her relationship with Thorne has ended. As Rick gets ready for Brooke and Ridge’s engagement party Brooke stops by to encourage him once again to sing for them and tells him to sing with Phoebe if he is too nervous.  Ridge tells Brooke that Thorne and Taylor have split up. Ridge assures Brooke that he will not let Rick spoil their evening. Brooke sees Phoebe and Rick talking and laughing and is pleased that they make each other happy. She doesn’t see anything wrong with their relationship. The party begins and the family compliments Pam on how wonderful she looks in Eric’s design. Stephanie thanks her for taking such good care of the family while she was away. Eric and Pam share a dance and Phoebe and Rick sing “Unforgettable” for Brooke and Ridge. The chemistry between the two of them is undeniable. After they share a moment on the terrace Ridge tells Rick if he crosses the line with Phoebe he’ll kill him.  Taylor tells Nick about her break up with Thorne. Nick cheers Taylor up and tells her he will take her to Chuck’s for some wings.
